name: TraceSecurity
overview:
TraceSecurity, Inc. provides information technology security compliance and risk management solutions. The company offers TraceCompliance Manager, a regulatory compliance software, which is used to integrate and automate regulatory compliance audits, policy management and dissemination, vulnerability assessment, vulnerability alerting, employee education and testing, and file/URL integrity monitoring; and Trace Risk Manager, a risk management software, which identifies foreseeable risks in service interruption or unauthorized disclosure, misuse, alteration, and destruction of confidential information. It also provides Trace IT Audit Manager that enables an organization to perform regular IT audit using regulatory and best practices guidelines; TraceComply, which is used for security compliance tracking and reporting. The company delivers its solutions through an integrated software-as-a-service platform. It serves credit union, banking, insurance, general business/retail, education, government, healthcare, and electric power industries. TraceSecurity was formerly known as Blaze Technologies LLC.

The company is headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

funding_rounds.source_description: TRACESECURITY CLOSES $8 MILLION IN SERIES C FUNDING TO CAPITALIZE ON AGGRESSIVE GROWTH IN THE CORPORATE COMPLIANCE MARKET SPACE
